body_html:
@Mulf as you can observe, the wheel you are trying to download to install TensorFlow is compatible with Python 3.5 (cp35-cp35m-win) therefore the error telling you it is not compatible.

There are a couple of options:

  1. Create a conda environment for Python=3.5 and install TF on it
  2. Download a previous version of Anaconda with Python 3.5
  3. Build from source

The simplest is the first but you may choose what works best for you.
If you have any further doubts feel free to ask. If not this issue can be closed.

body:
@Mulf as you can observe, the wheel you are trying to download to install TensorFlow is compatible with Python 3.5 (`cp35-cp35m-win`) therefore the error telling you it is not compatible. 

There are a couple of options:

1. Create a conda environment for Python=3.5 and install TF on it
2. Download a previous version of Anaconda with Python 3.5
3. Build from source

The simplest is the first but you may choose what works best for you.
If you have any further doubts feel free to ask. If not this issue can be closed.
